text.__SUMMARY__: Acacia chrysopoda is a shrub of the genus Acacia and the subgenus Plurinerves. It is native to an area in the Wheatbelt and Goldfields-Esperance regions of Western Australia.The compact dense shrub typically grows to a height of 0.3 to 1.0 metre (1 to 3 ft). It blooms in July and produces yellow flowers.
